description:
Kangaroo is a SQL client and admin tool.

Kangaroo is a AI-powered SQL client and admin tool for popular databases(MariaDB / MongoDB / MySQL / Oracle / PostgreSQL / SQLite / SQLServer / ...) on Windows / MacOS / Linux, support table design, query, model, sync, export/import etc, focus on comfortable, fun and developer friendly.
New features & bug-fixes
- MongoDB: MongoDB 8.0 support
- MongoDB: full collection support
- MongoDB: list database support
- MongoDB: list role support
- MongoDB: list user support
- MongoDB: list function support
- MongoDB: list command support
- MongoDB: query support
- DataGrid: Add tree view support
- DataGrid: refactor context menu
- DataGrid: implement model expand support
- DataGrid: fixed value change and display issue
- DataGrid: fixed first value crash issue
- DataGrid: fixed live mode crash issue
- SQLite: fixed model reading issue
- Update Chinese translation(zh-CN/zh-SG/zh-Hans/zh-Hant)
